editions.effect:
**Stealth** *(This unit can't be targeted by attacks unless permitted by **true sight**.)*

[Class Bonus] [Element Bonus] Whenever you reveal CARDNAME from your memory, you may put %it%a card named CARDNAME from your memory% onto the field.
